Bink SDK 1.7b

RADTimerRead

The function RADTimerRead returns a rolling millisecond timer.

U32 RADTimerRead();

Returns

Returns a new millisecond count.

Discussion

This function just gives you a millisecond count. It wraps around every 49 days or so.


Group: The RAD_IOP API for the Sony PS2
Related Basic Types: U32
